attributes.action: Create a new wine bottle measurement Herod 1.125 litres, one bottle and a half.
attributes.additional_details: Other bottle names follow biblical kings; I propose this new 1.125 litre measurement be called a Herod.  I would like this to be raise with the Office for Product Safety and Standards (OPSS) and the Department for Business and Trade (DBT).
attributes.background: Many couples who share a bottle of wine feel that one bottle between two is not enough, but two bottles would be too many. Therefore, a bottle and a half would be reasonable amount to share.
